mapper.select: SELECT ta.id, ta.spu_id, ta.sale_attr_name, ta.base_sale_attr_id, tb.id as spu_sale_attr_value_id, tb.sale_attr_value_name FROM spu_sale_attr ta INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value tb ON ta.spu_id = tb.spu_id AND ta.base_sale_attr_id = tb.base_sale_attr_id WHERE ta.spu_id = #{spuId}

SELECT tb1.id, tb1.spu_id, tb1.base_sale_attr_id, tb1.sale_attr_name, tb2.id AS spu_sale_attr_value_id, tb2.sale_attr_value_name, IF (tb3.id IS NULL, 0, 1) isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr tb1 INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value tb2 ON tb1.spu_id = tb2.spu_id AND tb1.base_sale_attr_id = tb2.base_sale_attr_id LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value tb3 ON tb3.sale_attr_value_id = tb2.id AND tb3.spu_id = tb1.spu_id AND tb3.sku_id = #{skuId} WHERE tb1.spu_id = #{spuId}
